ScoresIterator - Class in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.player
A class providing an iterator to access scores It can provide access also to a subset of scores by providing a starting index The iteration works as follows: The first value returned by ScoresIterator.next() is points[index] Subsequent calls to ScoresIterator.next() will return the next values in the array When ScoresIterator.next() has been called for points.length times, ScoresIterator.next() will always return the last value of the array

WeaponCard - Class in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.items.weapons
A class describing a light representation of a weapon Holds information about: A textual description of the effects of the weapon, its reload cost and the additional cost for each effect.
